metadata.title: CVE-2019-13751 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Uninitialized data in SQLite in Google Chrome prior to 79.0.3945.79 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitive information from process memory via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '79.0.3945.79-0ubuntu1').
sqlite package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
sqlite3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.31.1-1ubuntu1').
